title: Simple Sequence
code:
Alice->Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?
Note right of Bob: Bob thinks
Bob-->Alice: I am good thanks!

title: Authentication Flow
code:
User->+Server: Login Request
Server->+Database: Query User
Database-->-Server: User Data
Server-->-User: Login Response

title: API Call Sequence
code:
Client->API: GET /users
API->Cache: Check Cache
Cache-->API: Cache Miss
API->Database: Query
Database-->API: Results
API-->Client: JSON Response

title: Error Handling
code:
User->System: Submit Form
System->Validator: Validate
Validator-->System: Error
System-->User: Show Error

title: Async Process
code:
Client->Server: Start Process
Note over Server: Processing...
Server->Queue: Add Job
Queue-->Worker: Execute
Worker-->Client: Notify Complete
